attributes.action: Take action to reduce the media stronghold held by Rupert Murdoch in the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With SKY TV increasingly controlling  TV rights in the UK and the Publishing rights held by Mr Murdoch's News International, this individual has an increasingly unhealthy share of the nations media.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
